notes:
It is a [[Football]] moving out of own intentions.

name: Football (Creature)
behaviour: Constantly rolling around, does no damage.
location: It was first seen near the [[Rathleton Magistrate]] on the [[Test Server]] prior to the [[Updates/10.5|Summer Update 2014]]. It also spawned in [[Thais]] during the same Test Server.
strategy: You can't kill it. Give up.
